text:
Hello,

Is anyone able to guide me in providing an endpoint URL for an API to receive leads from an outsource without using a HubSpot URL?

We have created a private app that we need it for.

Please let me know if more details are needed to make this make sense.

Thank you.

Hello guys,
first thank you so much for your work with the API. I am trying to integrate the user provisioning API of HubSpot into my application everything is fine I can assign delete permissions etc.. however for some reasons the API does not retrieve for me the superadmin permission with the API, any idea if this is normal?
